He said: Why were Morecambe and Wise never knighted? "The Two Ronnies, why were they never knighted? Our comedic people never get knighted. Asked to choose his best game of the season, Michael Vick selected the playoff game against the Packers, despite three sacks, an interception on the final throw and a season-ending loss. Honestly, it might sound crazy, but( the Packers game) I just felt so much confidence, Michael Vick told PFW. "I was just so in tune with everything: the protection, the blitz, where it was coming from, all my progressions, where everybody was supposed to be lined up.
